title: Substitute the Value
text: Substitute $$x=3$$ into the function, we get $$f(3)={\operatorname{1.2}\left(e\right)}^{2\times3}-0.3$$.

title: Simplify the Exponent
text: What is the value of $$e^{2\times3}$$? (Round to the $$6$$ decimal places)

title: Multiply by the Coefficient
text: Multiply by the coefficient, we get $$1.2\times403.428793=484.114552$$

title: Add the Constant Term
text: Add the constant term, we get $$f(3)=484.114552-0.3=483.814552$$
